description: Michael Lance is rope-tied and plug-gagged on his knees in front of a Faultline table. Clint Cooper offers him a drink, and when Lance asks for some, spits a mouthful in his face. Clint holds the bottle in the air and pours it into Lance's mouth, in bigger quantities than Lance can swallow. He then douses Lance with a bottle of beverage, which may contain his piss. He pulls Lance to his feet and ties him, gagged, to a St. Andrew's cross, then uses Lance's hard chest as a punching bag. Finally, Cooper jerks Lance's cock till he shoots in big spurts. Untying Lance, Clint pushes and drags him over to a standing cage and locks him in, then turns off the lights with Lance screaming to be let out.
title: L.A.D.B. Grey - Bar-Sloppy Drinker
